attributes.additional_details:
The current government has wasted time, money and effort in multiple areas since being elected.
Current polling in the UK shows that the people do not support the governments handling in numerous areas and support for the sitting prime minister is at a all time low.
If this government is left to serve it's term the damage to the economy and the UK as a whole will be irreversible.
Deep divisions are being made throughout the UK. 
The Mps do not represent the people or interests
attributes.background: As the sitting government has now met it's pledge to deliver brexit it is now time to call a general election. A new government is now required to steer the UK through the rest of the pandemic and onto a brighter future.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
